title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 79-7.3 - [Effective until 12/22/2025] Experience requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 79-7.3 - [Effective until 12/22/2025] Experience requirements

State Regulations

An applicant shall meet the experience requirement for
certification by completing the practicum, or clinical or work experience which
the applicant must complete as part of the professional education requirements
for certification, as prescribed in section
79-7.2
of this

Subpart. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
79-7.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. An applicant shall meet the experience requirement for
certification
by completing the practicum, or clinical or work experience which the applicant must complete as part of the professional education requirements for
certification, as prescribed in section
79-7.2
of this Subpart. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
79-7.3
